Detailed Description

Multi-lingual translation class used for looking up predefined strings in a translation table resource.

char * Translate::process (  char *    originalText ) 
 

Translate the given text into the foreign language.

<char*> originalText - the original text to be translated

return : <char*> the translated text. if not found, return the original text.
